Ana.name: Healing Dart
Ana.description: Fire a dart which heals the first allied Hero hit for 205 (+4% per level) Health. Does not affect full Health Heroes.

Ana.name: Biotic Grenade
Ana.description: Toss a Grenade at the target area. Allied Heroes hit are healed for 166 (+4% per level) Health and receive 25% increased healing from Ana for 4 seconds. Enemies hit take 60 (+4% per level) damage and receive 100% less healing for 2 seconds.

Ana.name: Sleep Dart
Ana.description: Fire a dart that puts the first enemy Hero hit to Sleep, Stunning them for 3 seconds. Sleep's effects end instantly if the target takes damage after the first 0.5 seconds.  Cannot be used on Vehicles.

Ana.name: Eye of Horus
Ana.description: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 6 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds hit the first allied or enemy Hero or enemy Structure in their path. Allies are healed for 285 (+4% per level) and enemies are damaged for 166 (+4% per level). Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

Ana.name: Nano Boost
Ana.description: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster.  Cannot be used on Ana.

Ana.name: Shrike
Ana.description: Basic Attacks apply a Dose to enemies, dealing an additional 40 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds, and stacking up to 5 times.  Every 0.5 seconds, Ana is healed for 50% of the damage dealt by Shrike.

1.name: Grenade Calibration
1.description: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes with Biotic Grenade.  Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes, Biotic Grenade does 75% more damage per allied and enemy Hero hit.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Biotic Grenade's duration on allies is increased from 4 seconds to 12 seconds, its healing radius is increased by 100%, and its healing amplification applies to all sources.

1.name: Piercing Darts
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Sleep Dart.  Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes, Sleep Dart now hits 2 Heroes and its range is increased by 25%.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Healing Dart now hits 2 Heroes and its range is increased by 25%.

1.name: Detachable Box Magazine
1.description: Quest: Stack 5 Doses on an enemy Hero.  Reward: After reaching maximum Dosage 12 times, unlock the Active Reload Ability, which can be activated to instantly gain 3 charges of Healing Dart.

4.name: Overdose
4.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Sleep Dart applies 3 Doses.

4.name: Aim Down Sights
4.description: Shrike can be activated to increase vision radius by 100% and Basic Attack range by 2 but reduce Movement Speed by 20%. Lasts until canceled.

4.name: Air Strike
4.description: Activate to use Biotic Grenade with a 275% increased range, but Grenades thrown this way take 3 seconds to land.  Passive: Reduce Biotic Grenade cooldown by 4 seconds.

7.name: Temporary Blindness
7.description: After Sleep Dart's effects wear off, targets are Blinded for 2 seconds.

7.name: Mind-Numbing Agent
7.description: Every Dose a Hero has reduces their Spell Power by 10%.

7.name: Debilitating Dart
7.description: Activate to fire a dart which Slows the Movement Speed and reduces the damage dealt by the first enemy Hero it hits by 50% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Nano Boost
10.description: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster.  Cannot be used on Ana.

10.name: Eye of Horus
10.description: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 6 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds hit the first allied or enemy Hero or enemy Structure in their path. Allies are healed for 285 (+4% per level) and enemies are damaged for 166 (+4% per level). Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

13.name: Speed Serum
13.description: Healing Dart grants 25% Movement Speed to affected Heroes for 2 seconds.

13.name: Purifying Darts
13.description: Healing Dart removes Roots and Slows from the target, and heals for 20% more when doing so.

13.name: Smelling Salts
13.description: Healing Dart removes Stuns from the target, and grants them 50 Armor for 2 seconds when doing so.

16.name: Sharpshooter
16.description: Healing Dart's healing is increased by 5% if it heals a Hero, up to 50%. This bonus is reset if Healing Dart fails to hit a Hero.

16.name: Concentrated Doses
16.description: Increase Healing Dart's healing by 10% for each Dose active on enemy Heroes.

16.name: Contact Healing
16.description: Biotic Grenade heals for 30% more per allied and enemy Hero hit.

20.name: Nano Infusion
20.description: Allies affected by Nano Boost heal for 50% of Spell Damage dealt.

20.name: Ballistic Advantage
20.description: Eye of Horus rounds explode upon impacting a Hero, healing nearby allies for 300 (+4% per level) and dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemy Heroes.

20.name: Somnolent Doses
20.description: Upon stacking 5 Doses, Heroes are put to Sleep for 2 seconds.

20.name: Dynamic Shooting
20.description: Basic Attacks increase Attack Speed by 10% for 4 seconds, up to 100%.

20.name: Custom Optics
20.description: Increase the Aim Down Sights Basic Attack range bonus from 2 to 4.
